title: Do Good, Look Good Charity Event
desc:
RSVP to let us know you'll join us on December 9th for drinks, good will, and great style. Donate your gently used dress clothing and outerwear and receive credit toward brand new Trumaker shirts, suits, blazers, and sweaters. For each donated item, receive $10 in Trumaker credit.* All donations will benefit Career Gear, a local?organization that provides professional clothing and mentoring to help New York City men enter the work force, stay employed, and become role models. 
 
 *No limit to the number of donated items accepted. Receive $10 in credit for each gently used item of clothing you donate to receive up to $30 off each new Trumaker item. Credit must be used by 12/18 or within one week of your donation.
